text: "The Clown" is a 1981 song by Conway Twitty and is the leading single from his 44th studio album Southern Comfort. It went to number 1 on the Billboard Hot Country single charts and number 7 on the Canadian RPM Country Tracks charts. ==References== Category:1981 songs Category:Country songs Category:Conway Twitty songs
title: The Clown (Conway Twitty song)
